column5: I've been seeing some pretty cool videos posted by our members. I can't wait to try out my Go-Pro on the ice.  Here's a compilation of my late summer and early fall adventures. Is it too early to say that I can't wait for spring!!!!
Thanks! One of my favorite parts as well!
That doubleheader underwater footage was sweet!  Good stuff as always Luc!
Great video buddy. Makes me miss the spring as well (although i never get quite so many fish)
